courses.title: Introduction to Music Theory
courses.description: Learn the basics of music theory including notes, chords, scales, and rhythm.

courses.title: Piano Mastery
courses.description: Master the piano with comprehensive lessons covering technique, theory, and repertoire.

courses.title: Guitar Fundamentals
courses.description: Start your guitar journey by learning essential chords, strumming patterns, and music fundamentals.

courses.title: Music Production Essentials
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of music production, including recording, mixing, and mastering.

courses.title: Singing Techniques Workshop
courses.description: Discover and improve your singing voice with professional techniques and exercises.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation Masterclass
courses.description: Unlock the secrets of jazz improvisation with advanced concepts and practical exercises.

courses.title: Music History: From Baroque to Modern
courses.description: Explore the rich history of music from the Baroque period to modern times.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Dive into the world of electronic music production, from synthesis to beatmaking.

courses.title: Songwriting Workshop
courses.description: Learn the art and craft of songwriting, from lyric writing to melody composition.

courses.title: Music Business Fundamentals
courses.description: Gain insights into the music industry, including marketing, copyright, and contracts.
